Package model

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.Game
  • public class Game
extends java.util.Observable
    Game model contains the class to create a model for the game. It is bounded with the Game Controller and the Board View.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Jaiganesh, Hasibul Huq, Gargi sharma

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        This method initializes the Game. It assigns the initial armies to the player. It randomly assigns the countries to the players.

      • addingStartupCountryArmy

        public boolean addingStartupCountryArmy​(java.lang.String countryName)
        This method add armies to the country during the startup phase and returns true when successful.
        Parameters:
        countryName - name of country
        Returns:
        true if valid phase otherwise false

      • addingReinforcementCountryArmy

        Parameters:
        countryName - name of country
        Returns:
        true

      • reinforcementPhaseSetup

        public void reinforcementPhaseSetup()
        This method initializes the reinforcement phase for each player by adding corresponding number of armies.

      • calculationForNumberOfArmiesInReinforcement

        public int calculationForNumberOfArmiesInReinforcement​(Player player)
        This method calculates the corresponding reinforcement armies from a particular player from the number of countries owned by the layer.
        Parameters:
        player - Player
        Returns:
        total number of armies in reinforcement

      • getConnectedCountries

        countryList - list of countries

        public boolean fortificationPhase​(java.lang.String source,
